/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a car on the road, providing a driver's perspective of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban environment. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
